meanings.definition: Not in a direct way; indirectly.
meanings.sent1: She answered obliquely, avoiding the main question.
meanings.sent2: He glanced obliquely at the clock on the wall.
meanings.sent3: The cat looked obliquely at the toy, pretending not to be interested.
meanings.sent4: Her words hit him obliquely, making him realize the truth.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight filtered obliquely through the trees, creating a magical effect.
